alert.note: Alert for Fluvanna; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 3:54PM EST until March 12 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 3 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to two inches. * WHERE...Fluvanna and Western Louisa Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 3 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan reduced visibility and possible a slushy accumulation on secondary roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A northwest wind of 20 mph with gusts to around 30 mph is also expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go to http://DriveNC.gov.
